attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we want to know why the people off  N/ireland dont pay Council tax and yet they are part of the UK,They have all the benfitts and housing and more to enjoy as the rest of us do here in the UK.Lets us all be like the people off
N/Ireland and live a council tax stress
free life and enjoy the same benfitts

rejection.details: You need to create a proper title for your petition - not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
